live_updates: Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services. Thank you for your patience.
Work still continues in the area to get all services back online.
Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
37691.summary: Some customers in New Westminster (Columbia) are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37691.title: May 24 – New Westminster| All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37701.summary: Some customers in the North Haven area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37701.title: May 25 – Calgary (North Haven) | All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)
